text: Randolph Blake (born 1945)AAAS Book of Members, Chapter B is an American psychologist, currently the Centennial Professor at Vanderbilt University and an Elected Fellow of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences and National Academy of Sciences. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Vanderbilt University faculty Category:American psychologists Category:Vanderbilt University alumni Category:Fellows of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences Category:Members of the United States National Academy of Sciences
title: Randolph Blake
